attributes.action: have motorways policed to ensure drivers keep in the left lane unless overtaking.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Drivers hogging the centre and right lanes on the motorway is dangerous and causes unecessary delays & creates frustration. The police should spend more time ensuring other safer driving practices than just ensnaring speeding cars.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
